channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 70% Drop In U.S.-Canada Travel Is Not Just A Geopolitical Issue, It Can Be A Climate Setback

item.title: Designed, Designy or Well-designed?
item.description: If we create something with purpose, we’ve designed it. It’s not an accident. An axe handle is designed, and so is a symphony. Some things, though are...

item.title: Breaking Barriers In IT Operations: Overcoming Legacy Constraints In Intelligent Automation
item.description: To achieve the benefits of intelligent automation, enterprises and IT service providers should adopt intelligent change management.

item.title: Agentic AI: Building Trust And Transforming Mobile Experiences
item.description: Leaders must proactively invest in building agentic AI ecosystems that prioritize user trust and ethical considerations.

item.title: Why Enterprise Digital Transformation Should Start With Payments
item.description: By starting with payments, businesses can lay the foundation for a more efficient, secure and customer-centric operation.

item.title: Psychometric Machines: How Can Our Technology Develop Empathy?
item.description: Physiological data-enabled empathy detection holds huge potential.
